Optimizer

Interface for implementing different optimizers.

NestedOptimizer

Optimizers that modify cost function throughout optimization.

Finds the parameters which minimize given cost function.

Parameters

  • initial_params â€“ initial parameters for the cost function.

  • keep_history â€“ flag indicating whether history of cost function evaluations should be recorded.

orquestra.opt.api.optimizer.optimization_result(opt_value, opt_params, **kwargs) → scipy.optimize.OptimizeResult#

Construct instance of OptimizeResult.

The purpose of this function is to add a safety layer by detecting if required components of OptimizationResult are missing already during static analysis.

Parameters

  • opt_value â€“ the final value of the function being optimized.

  • opt_params â€“ the parameters (arguments) for which opt_value has been achieved.

  • kwargs â€“ other attributes (e.g. history) that should be stored in OptimizeResult.

Returns

An instance of OptimizeResult containing opt_value, opt_params and all of the other passed arguments.

orquestra.opt.api.optimizer.construct_history_info(cost_function: orquestra.opt.api.CostFunction, keep_history: bool) → Dict[str, orquestra.opt.history.recorder.AnyHistory]#
orquestra.opt.api.optimizer.extend_histories(cost_function: orquestra.opt.history.recorder.AnyRecorder, histories: Dict[str, List]) → Dict[str, List]#
class orquestra.opt.api.optimizer.NestedOptimizer#

Bases: abc.ABC

Optimizers that modify cost function throughout optimization. An example of such optimizer could be on that freezes certain parameters during every iteration or adds new layers of the underlying circuit (so called layer-by-layer optimization).

See MockNestedOptimizer in orquestra.opt.mock_objects for an example.

Parameters

  • inner_optimizer â€“ Optimizer object used in the inner optimization loop.

  • recorder â€“ recorder object which defines how to store the optimization history.

Returns

opt_value, opt_params, nit: total number of iterations of inner_optimizer, nfev: total number of calls to cost function, history: a list of HistoryEntrys.

If keep_history is False this should be an empty list.

gradient_history: if the cost function is a FunctionWithGradient,

this should be a list of HistoryEntrys representing previous calls to the gradient.

Return type

An instance of OptimizeResult containing

property inner_optimizer(self) → Optimizer#

Inner optimizer used by this optimizer.

property recorder(self) → orquestra.opt.history.recorder.RecorderFactory#

Factory for creating recorders of functions being minimized.

minimize(self, cost_function_factory: Callable[Ellipsis, orquestra.opt.api.CostFunction], initial_params: numpy.ndarray, keep_history: bool = False) → scipy.optimize.OptimizeResult#

Finds optimal parameters to minimize the cost function factory.

Parameters

  • cost_function_factory â€“ function that generates CostFunction objects.

  • initial_params â€“ initial parameters used for optimization

  • keep_history â€“ flag indicating whether history of cost function evaluations should be recorded.
